original_text: Remember to help those believers who are in prison. Think about what that would be like, if you were there with them. Remember those believers who are receiving trouble from people. Think about them as if you were receiving the same pain in your own body.
korean_text: 너희도 함께 갇힌 것 같이 갇힌 자를 생각하고 너희도 몸을 가졌은즉 학대 받는 자를 생각하라

sentences.korean_translation: 그 믿는 사람들을 도와주라는 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: Think about what that would be like
if you were there with them
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 그들과 함께 그곳에 있다면

sentences.original_text: who are receiving trouble from people
as if you were receiving the same pain
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 당신이 똑같은 고통을 받는 것처럼
